name: stereotyped
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
past simple and past participle of
stereotype
to have a set idea about what a particular type of person is like, especially an idea that is wrong: The study claims that British advertising stereotypes women. We tried not to give the children sexually stereotyped toys. Synonym
pigeonhole
